creator: andrei.astrouski@gmail.com
text: If bg color is set in the Style panel, xml node (in styles.xml) <cellXfs> -> <xf> doesn't have 'applyFill' attribute, and getFillForegroundXSSFColor method checks this parameter. As a result method returns null.

creator: andrei.astrouski@gmail.com
text: And for the same reason method getFillPattern returns 0.

creator: yegor@dinom.ru
text:
Andrey,

You will get nothing by raising priority of your bugs in Bugzilla. The status of your tickets  is NEW which means that no one from the POI team found time to work on them.

One thing to remember is that Apache POI is a volunteer project. If these bugs are important to you, please do work on them and submit patches! At minimum, post sample Java code that demonstrates the problem.  Ideally that would be a failing unit test. If the test requires a input .xlsx file then please attach it too. 

Yegor

No update in years, no sample code, therefore closing this as WONTFIX for now. If this is still an issue for you with the latest release 3.13-beta1 then please reopen with at least some sample code that shows the problem, preferably as unit test.
creator: dominik.stadler@gmx.at
gwoolsey@apache.org
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 56295 ***
